entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg - The Forks 03:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -28.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -31.8°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Blowing snow in outlying areas in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow in outlying areas early in the evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
